code: @Override public IndexOutput createOutput(String name, IOContext context) throws IOException {     this.ensureOpen().     return new SmbFSIndexOutput(name). }

comment: // This implementation ensures, that we never write more than CHUNK_SIZE bytes:
code: // This implementation ensures, that we never write more than CHUNK_SIZE bytes: @Override public void write(byte[] b, int offset, int length) throws IOException {     while (length > 0) {         final int chunk = Math.min(length, CHUNK_SIZE).         out.write(b, offset, chunk).         length -= chunk.         offset += chunk.     } }
